page.title: 07TOURISM IN THE COUNTRY
page.content: Mr & Mrs Broomfield and their 2 children have recently bought Westaway a 12 bedroomed hotel on the Coach Rd to St Ives under TRINK Hill an ideal situation for{tourist trade.}Formerly the old counthouse this cottage has been extensively rebuilt and enlarged. Faced with local granite,modernised. The surrounding 3 acres have hens, sheep & cows.Cooking is done with {calor gas.Heating by electricity}mains water.Fish,milk & cream are delivered. There is no public transport.Shopping is done in Penzance or Hayle by car.Mr Broomfield cooks the meals.The children help by waiting and washing up.As the Broomfields have just returned from Canada the meals have a Canadian flavour.200yds away is a countryclub for evening{entertainment. _
